amendment.description: Amendment redirects $40 million from Assistance for Europe and Eurasia to fund Armenian democracy assistance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 84 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase and decrease funding by $40 million from Assistance for Europe and Eurasia to fund Armenian democracy assistance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A081) Agreed to by recorded vote: 268 - 152 (Roll no. 330).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A081) Agreed to by recorded vote: 268 - 152 (Roll no. 330).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A081) offered by Ms. Speier.
